title: Ticket #4514: job router detail/feature
description:
There's an interesting feature in the Job Router that isn't documented: if you first set an attribute with eval_set_, it cannot be overridden with set_, but must be overridden with eval_set_.

From an email,

In a job route, this does NOT work, 

   set_RequestCpus = 8;

But this DOES work 

   eval_set_RequestCpus = 8;
check_ins: 2015-Feb-26 11:45   Check-in [43463]: job router doc detail added #4514 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
